title: Pennylu_0018
author: Pennylu_0018
created_time: November 02, 2022, 02:05:09 PMLast edit: November 10, 2022, 04:59:33 AM by Pennylu_0018
content: WEBSITE ⬢ TWITTER ⬢ TELEGRAM ⬢ WHITE PAPERTo participate you need a USDT-BSC WalletBounty Pool: Canceled due to inactive attendance and 0 participant filling in the submission forms on 11/10.There will be 10 winners in total. At the end of the bounty campaign, we will count the number of stakes earned in all bounty programs and reward the best. To increase your chances of winning, participate in several bounty programs.To learn more about Zebec Operation Horizon:1. Please visit the official website: horizon.zebec.io 2. Join the Telegram group: https://t.me/zebechorizon 3. Refer to related documents: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lXV_nhw_ZEnpuRsPZQ4fe3uk2GeEBDu2MTa8s311kSU/edit?usp=sharing ===============================================================================GENERAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS* If a participant is found to be used ill-practice for any campaign. A participant will be disqualified.* Participants using foul language/funds will be disqualified.* If rules set out in these campaigns are not followed, the participants will NOT be rewarded accordingly and no negotiation will be entertained.* Disqualified members will lose the entire stakes/reward earned and this is irrevocable.* The disqualified member will not be informed. To review your status, please check the status sheet.* The rewards will be distributed at the end of the bounty program.* Submission of work must be provided via the submission form. It is mandatory and the only way for the work results in acceptance. Only submitted work in the submission form will be counted for stakes.* You can keep your work posted in this thread (optional) to ensure the bounty claims later along with all other details asked in the submission form (as proof of stakes).* Submit the proof of authentication in the thread whatever campaign you are participating in. It is a mandatory option.#Proof Of AuthenticationBitcointalk username : Bitcointalk profile Link: Telegram username: Participating campaigns: BSC address : * We will update the stakes [weekly].* You are NOT allowed to ask about the bounty campaign in the official chat of the project.===============================================================================Stakes will be paid depending on friends/followers (at the start of the campaign).100-300 Followers/Friends: 1 stake per week301-1000 Followers/Friends: 2 stakes per week1001-4000 Followers/Friends: 3 stakes per week4001-10000 Followers/Friends: 4 stakes per week10001+ Followers/Friends: 5 stakes per weekRules:1. You must join Telegram here: https://t.me/+ymKpp7XQrBBjZmVl2. Each Participant should follow the official Twitter: https://twitter.com/Zebec_HQ 3. Minimum of 100 Followers only can join the Campaign.4. Report should be 5 minimum Retweet and 1 Tweet with the tags: #Zebec #OperationHorizon #ZepochNode #ZepochNodes5. Tweet must be at least 50 characters summarizing Zebec / Operation Horizon.6. All reports must be on time or else you will get 0.7. If you have no new posts from our official Twitter account, kindly make a short post about Operation Horizon and use all of our official hashtags.8. Your privacy settings must be set to public so that we can check your work.===============================================================================Stakes will be paid depending on posts (at the start of the campaign).5 posts per week: 1 stake10 posts per week: 2 stake15 posts per week: 3 stake20 posts per week: 4 stake25+ posts per week: 5 stake Rules:1. You must join Telegram here: https://t.me/+ymKpp7XQrBBjZmVl2. You should not just write messages, but conduct a dialogue with the participants of the project telegram chat ( https://t.me/zebechorizon ).3. You are NOT allowed to write a message about the bounty campaign in the project telegram chat.4. You should not have the name of another project in the profile name.5. Participants are prohibited from using any hashtags in the telegram chat.6. Words of greeting "hi, hello, etc." and words of goodbye "bye, goodbye" are not counted!7. Once a week, you must send a report in the form.8. In order to participate you must pass an interview with a bounty manager. Join this Telegram group or contact @pennylu_0018===============================================================================Best Video: 72 stakesGood Video: 48 stakesMedium Video: 24 stakesLow Video: 12 stakes Rules:1. You must join Telegram here: https://t.me/+ymKpp7XQrBBjZmVl2. Video must be above 3 minutes long.3. Videos must include a link to the official website in the description.4. Must have your Telegram username in the description.5. Video must be published on a crypto-related YouTube channel with a minimum of 150 subscribers.6. Plagiarism or use of other's material will be considered invalid submissions.7. We would accept any positive video about Zebec Operation Horizon, not only about the Zepoch Node NFT sale, but about the idea itself, use cases, benefits, etc.8. No more than 3 videos from one person.===============================================================================We divide all kinds of content, including articles and blog posts into 3 categories:Excellent: 36 stakesVery good: 24 stakesGood: 12 stakesRules:1. You must join Telegram here: https://t.me/+ymKpp7XQrBBjZmVl2. You can use our official images, logos, and graphics on our website.3. Articles should contain at least 500 characters.4. The article or description of the video should contain at least 1 link to our website. At least 1 link to your profile should be indicated in the article or description of the video to prove your authorship.5. Only 5 posts from one user are accepted on blogging platforms, like "Medium", "Steemit", etc.6. Articles must be interesting and aim to build this project.===============================================================================Stakes will be paid depending on karma (at the start of the campaign). 30-60 post karma/ comment karma: 1 stake per week61-100 post karma/ comment karma: 2 stakes per week101-300 post karma/ comment karma : 3 stakes per week301+ post karma/ comment karma: 4 stakes per weekRules:1. You must join Telegram here: https://t.me/+ymKpp7XQrBBjZmVl2. We reserve the right to not consider your Reddit account eligible if you are extremely low quality/bot etc.3. Your account must be at least 2 months old and have at least 50 posts or comment karma.4. External posts should link to Zebec Operation Horizon website.5. Posts with negative karma will obviously not be accepted. Any kind of spam will not be rewarded either.6. Your post must be made in one of the following subreddits or cryptocurrency-related subreddits:r/cryptocurrency, r/altcoin, r/defi etc.7. We will give awards based on the quality of the content, the number of upvotes, karma, and how many comments it generates, etc. We may take other criteria into account.8. Post must be at least 50 characters summarizing Operation Horizon.9. You can complete a total of 7 posts per week. A maximum of 2 posts per day. 10. Low-quality content will be denied without pay.11. You must follow our Twitter and join our Horizon Telegram group, if not, it will NOT be counted.===============================================================================We divide all kinds of content, including images and gifs into 3 categories:Excellent: 3 stakesVery good: 2 stakesGood: 1 stakesRules:1. You must join Telegram here: https://t.me/+ymKpp7XQrBBjZmVl2. You can use our official images, logos, and graphics on our website.3. Images should be at least 512 x 512 pixels.4. The creation should contain a Zebec logo and be related to Operation Horizon.5. Only 5 creations from one user are accepted.6. Creations must be interesting and aim to build this project.===============================================================================
